nodes.text: Xo'ru was a Kel Dor male bounty hunter who worked with Kindin during the Cold War.

In 3643 BBY, Xo'ru and another hunter named Kindin traveled to Ord Mantell to capture and bring back the Smuggler who would later be known as the Voidhound, as the crime lord Rogun the Butcher had placed a bounty on the smuggler's head for losing a shipment of blasters that belonged to him.

When Ace arrived at the docking bay in Fort Garnik, he was confronted by Xo'ru and Kindin who too had just arrived. Unwilling to convince Ace to come with them, the two along with Ace and Corso Riggs got into a fight which both Xo'ru and Kindin were killed.
